ratings.comment: Professor Hustad is the reason I decided to declare the CSD major. She's always positive and very clear with her expectations. Not a lot of homework, and if you actually pay attention in class you'll do very well. Don't be on your phone as she does notice.  Very forgiving of situations that may arise.

Professor Hustad is great! She's always so positive in class and gives great examples for everything she teaches.  She gives extra credit just for showing up to class and if you pay attention,  tests are easy.

Prof Hustad is incredible engaged with her students during all parts of the lecture. She makes CSD110 exciting and fun to be in and is very clear what information needs to be learned. Would recommend class to any student-even if the course is for a prereq.

Professor Hustad is one of the kindest professors I have had in a long time. She genuinely cares, is talkative, helpful, very easy class. Reviews before every exam on exactly what is going to be on it. GIves extra credit just for showing up to class. SHE IS AMAZING!!!!!
